verbose_text: IL-10 flox / flox mice (IL-10 fl/fl) were crossed to CD4-Cre and to LysM-Cre mice to produce mice that were deficient in IL-10 production from CD4 + and CD8 + T cells (IL-10 CD4-KO) or myeloid cells (IL-10 LysM-KO).
evidence: IL-10 flox/flox mice (IL-10 fl/fl ) were crossed to CD4-Cre and to LysM-Cre mice to produce mice that were deficient in IL-10 production from CD4 +  and CD8
